about.name: Ben Gundersen
about.title: Technical Product Manager
about.subtitle: Engineering Leadership & Experience Design
about.bio: I bridge the gap between technical implementation and user experience, building products that solve real problems at scale. With a background in both engineering and product management, I bring a unique perspective to creating elegant, performant solutions.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform Redesign
projects.description: Led the redesign of a multi-million dollar e-commerce platform, improving conversion rates by 35% and reducing cart abandonment by 22%.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive UX overhaul of legacy e-commerce system serving 500K+ monthly users. Implemented mobile-first design, streamlined checkout flow, and integrated modern payment solutions.

projects.title: Real-Time Collaboration Tool
projects.description: Built a real-time collaboration platform for distributed teams, supporting 10,000+ concurrent users with sub-100ms latency.
projects.longDescription: WebSocket-based collaboration tool with operational transformation for conflict-free editing, presence indicators, and integrated video chat.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Created an interactive analytics dashboard processing 1M+ data points in real-time with custom D3.js visualizations.
projects.longDescription: Enterprise analytics platform with custom charting library, real-time data streaming, and export capabilities. Used by executive team for strategic decision-making.

projects.title: Mobile App UX Optimization
projects.description: Redesigned mobile app experience resulting in 4.8 star rating (from 3.2) and 200% increase in daily active users.
projects.longDescription: Complete UX audit and redesign of iOS/Android apps. Conducted user research, A/B testing, and iterative prototyping to optimize user flows and reduce friction points.
